Package com.coherentsolutions.yaf.zephyr.scale.strategy

Class BasicZephyrScaleStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.coherentsolutions.yaf.zephyr.scale.strategy.BasicZephyrScaleStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
ZephyrScaleStrategy
@Component public class BasicZephyrScaleStrategy extends Object implements ZephyrScaleStrategy
Basic implementation of the ZephyrScaleStrategy interface for the Zephyr Scale system.

This class provides methods to create folders and cycles in the Zephyr Scale system. It uses ZephyrScaleClient to interact with the Zephyr Scale API and ZephyrScaleProperties to retrieve configuration properties.

  • Method Details

    • createFolders

      public void createFolders(ExecutionStartEvent executionStartEvent)
      Creates the necessary folders in the Zephyr Scale system.

      This method checks if the root folder exists and creates it if it does not.

      Specified by:
      createFolders in interface ZephyrScaleStrategy
      Parameters:
      executionStartEvent - the execution start event

    • createCycle

      public void createCycle(ExecutionStartEvent executionStartEvent)
      Creates a test cycle in the Zephyr Scale system.

      This method creates a new test cycle based on the provided ExecutionStartEvent. The cycle name is generated using the suite name and the current date and time.

      Specified by:
      createCycle in interface ZephyrScaleStrategy
      Parameters:
      executionStartEvent - the event that triggers the creation of the test cycle

    • captureTestKeys

      public void captureTestKeys()
      Captures the test keys for the current test cycle.

      This method retrieves the test executions associated with the current test cycle and extracts the test case keys from them. The keys are stored in the testKeys set.

      Specified by:
      captureTestKeys in interface ZephyrScaleStrategy

    • getTestCycleKey

      public String getTestCycleKey()
      Retrieves the test cycle key.

      If the cycle key is not provided in the properties, this method returns the key of the current cycle. Otherwise, it returns the cycle key from the properties.

      Returns:
      the test cycle key

    • prepareTestExecution

      private <T extends TestExecutionUpdateDTO> T prepareTestExecution(T obj, TestFinishEvent testFinishEvent)
      Prepares a test execution object with the necessary details.

      This method sets the execution time and status of the test execution object based on the provided TestFinishEvent. If the test result is not successful, it also sets the error comment.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the test execution object
      Parameters:
      obj - the test execution object to prepare
      testFinishEvent - the event that contains the test result
      Returns:
      the prepared test execution object

    • createIssueLink

      private void createIssueLink(TestExecution execution, TestFinishEvent testFinishEvent)
      Creates an issue link in the Zephyr Scale system.

      This method creates a link between a test execution and an issue in the Zephyr Scale system. It uses the provided test execution and test finish event to establish the link.

      Parameters:
      execution - the test execution to link
      testFinishEvent - the event that contains the test result and issue information

    • checkExistingBugs

      private void checkExistingBugs(TestFinishEvent testFinishEvent, String testKey)
      Checks for existing bugs linked to the test case.

      This method logs a warning if the test has passed but has bugs linked to it.

      Parameters:
      testFinishEvent - the event that contains the test result
      testKey - the test case key

    • createTestExecution

      public void createTestExecution(String testKey, TestFinishEvent testFinishEvent)
      Creates a test execution in the Zephyr Scale system.

      This method creates a test execution record based on the provided test case key and test finish event. It sets the test status, execution time, and any error comments.

      Specified by:
      createTestExecution in interface ZephyrScaleStrategy
      Parameters:
      testKey - the test case key
      testFinishEvent - the event that contains the test result

    • updateTestExecution

      public void updateTestExecution(String testKey, TestFinishEvent testFinishEvent)
      Updates the test execution in the Zephyr Scale system.

      This method updates an existing test execution record based on the provided test case key and test finish event. It sets the test status, execution time, and any error comments. If the test execution is not found, it logs a warning.

      Specified by:
      updateTestExecution in interface ZephyrScaleStrategy
      Parameters:
      testKey - the test case key
      testFinishEvent - the event that contains the test result
